---
title: "About this repository"
---

## General instructions

This repository contains the codes used to obtain and analyze the data used on a research study. Read about the [study](about.qmd).

The codes used here were written using `R version 4.0.3` and scripted on [Quarto](https://quarto.org/){target="_blank"} (`.qmd`) documents. Follow instruction on the [Get Started page](https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/){target="_blank"} of the Quarto website to run the scripts included in this repository.

::: callout-tip

## Reseach compendium

The full research compendium with data and scripts used for this study is stored in an [Open Science Framework](https://osf.io/){target="_blank"} repository and can be accessed [here](https://osf.io/wz3je/){target="_blank"}. Download the full repository and run the analysis in your machine.

:::
